sourceDesc.bibl: Transcription of the draft manuscript of De projectielantaarn "Aladin" by Raymond Brulez. The manuscript is written in black ink on 20 quarto sized pages (215 x275 mm). Raymond Brulez has added deletions, additions and revisions in black ink and in pencil. Words and phrases that were hard to read are tagged with the "unclear"-element and represented in square brackets. The last page ends with "Einde, Sint Michiels, den 27 December 1930" and Raymond Brulez' autograph.
